DOC.brief_title: Pharmacodynamic Study Better Understand Therapeutic Response Immunomodulatory Effects Avonex Multiple Sclerosis ( MS ) Patients Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Control Subjects ( Group 1 ) Must general good health . Must receive interferon past . All MS Subjects Clinical laboratorysupported diagnosis relapse remit MS ( McDonald et al , criterion number 14 ) . Either AVONEX® treatmentnaïve . Have EDSS score 0.0 5.5 , inclusive . History severe allergic anaphylactic reaction hypersensitivity human albumin , interferon , component drug formulation . History intolerance acetaminophen , ibuprofen , naproxen , aspirin would preclude use least one study . History clinically significant ( determined investigator ) cardiac , endocrinologic , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , and/or major disease . History malignancy . The presence significant medical condition psychiatric illness due MS , investigator 's opinion , would interfere therapy History uncontrolled seizure within 3 month prior enrollment . History suicidal ideation episode severe depression within 3 month prior enrollment . Serious local infection ( e.g. , cellulitis , abscess ) systemic infection ( e.g. , pneumonia , septicemia ) within 8 week prior enrollment . Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis C antibody ( HCV ) positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) screening . Other inclusion exclusion criterion apply per protocol
